content.question: The parenthetical comment in the first sentence of the passage (“an advantage which may be considered . . . well-officered county town”) most likely implies that Mrs. Barnaby had

choices.label: previously used her shyness to gain the favor of men
unfairly exploited her considerable influence over military men
suffered from a questionable reputation prior to her marriage
gained confidence from the popularity she had enjoyed with military men

content.answer: gained confidence from the popularity she had enjoyed with military men

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
